des:
With Vesta Smart Home skill for Amazon Alexa, you can change the security mode of your Climax system and control smart home devices and scenes by voice.

There are 2 parts to setting up Vesta Smart Home. Enable and Link Accounts here in Alexa Skill. Add/Edit smart home devices and scenes for automation in the Vesta portal or App.

To set up Vesta Smart Home in Alexa
You first need to register and create an account with Vesta portal at https://eu.vestasmarthome.com/Vesta

Once you have your account ready:
1. Click on Enable Skill button on this page
2. Then tap on the button that says Link Account
3. The Vesta login page will display
4. Enter your username and password
5. Press Login to link your Vesta account
6. Click Accept button
7. A screen should display saying 'Account linking successful'

Next, go to Vesta Portal to set up your smart home devices and scenes.

[Security]
To arm the security system when you’re away,
Alexa, arm <security panel> in away mode.

To disarm the security system,
Aelxa, disarm <security panel>.

To arm the security system when you’re home,
Alexa, arm <security panel> in stay mode.

[Smart Home]
To control a power switch,
"Alexa, turn on <device name>."
"Alexa, turn off <device name>."

To control a dimmer,
"Alexa, turn on <device name>."
"Alexa, turn off <device name>."
"Alexa, set <device name> to {0~100}%."
"Alexa, dim <device name> to {0~100}%."

To control a shutter,
"Alexa, turn on <device name>."
"Alexa, turn off <device name>."
"Alexa, set <device name> to {0~100}%."

To apply scenes,
"Alexa, turn on <scene name>."
"Alexa, turn off <scene name>."

To show or talk to the cam,
"Alexa, show me the <cam name>."
"Alexa, talk to the <cam name>."
